questionTitle: Which of the following can be best be described as a digital media receiver?
questionExplanation: Google TV is a media center software platform that will appear in some HDTVs.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the most widespread video streaming service?
questionExplanation: Metacafe is an entertainment site with movie trailers, TV shows, video games, and more.

questionTitle: Which of the following is another name for resources mentioned in the following figure?
questionExplanation: A machine instance (physical or virtual) is primarily defined by four essential resources.

questionTitle: What is the role played by Web service in SOA?
questionExplanation: SOA requires a standard messaging protocol and a form of federated database system.

questionTitle: Which of the following sells a server referred to as Cloud Attached Storage?
questionExplanation: Cloud Attached Storage is meant for the Small and Medium Business.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the most complete cloud computing service model?
questionExplanation: The most complete cloud computing service model is one in which the computing hardware and software, as well as the solution itself, are provided by a vendor as a complete service offering.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the most commonly used VoIP standard?
questionExplanation: IMS stands for IP Multimedia Subsystem.

questionTitle: Which of the following object database has the ability to create rich data objects and create relationships between them?
questionExplanation: Presentation builder allows you to drag and drop visual controls for creating Web forms and data entry screens and to include the logic necessary to automate what the user sees.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the machinery for interacting with Amazon’s vast product data and eCommerce catalog function?
questionExplanation:
This service, which was called Amazon E-Commerce Service (ECS), is the means for vendors to add their products to the Amazon.com site
and take orders and payments.

questionTitle: Which of the following feature is highly emphasized in an open system for mobile application?
questionExplanation: One effort to make mobile devices more interoperable is the W3C Mobile Web Initiative.

questionTitle: How many types of modeling topologies for message passing are used in SOMF?
questionExplanation: Four modeling topologies for message passing are used in SOMF.

questionTitle: Which of the following developer API is provided by FilesAnywhere service?
questionExplanation: FilesAnywhere is the creation of Dallas-based software design and consulting firm, Officeware systems.

questionTitle: AMIs are operating systems running on the _____ virtualization hypervisor.
questionExplanation: Each virtual private server is accorded a size rating called its EC2 Compute Unit.

questionTitle: Cloud computing is a _______ system and it is necessarily unidirectional in nature.
questionExplanation: Cloud computing is a stateless system, as is the Internet in general.

questionTitle: Which of the following is relational database service provided by Amazon?
questionExplanation: Amazon offers two different types of database services.

questionTitle: Which of the following Webmail service has IM clients embedded in it?
questionExplanation: This category of software is sometimes referred to as Enterprise Instant Messaging (EIM).

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: With Google Custom Search Engine and Subscribed Links, you can create a search engine tailored to your needs
questionOption2: Google Currents is a social magazine app by Google
questionOption3: Google Correlate is a social magazine app by Google
questionExplanation: Google Correlate finds search patterns that correlate with real-world data.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: Yahoo’s Exchange platform added features to compete with Notes
questionOption2: SIP stands for Session Initiation Protocol
questionOption3: Citrix GoToMeeting is one of the best-known collaboration software product
questionExplanation: Microsoft’s Exchange platform added features to compete with Notes.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the disadvantage of online office suite?
questionOption4: An Internet connection is required to access your documents
questionExplanation: Some cloud-based applications now offer what is called an “offline” mode so you can work on documents on your local system when an Internet connection is not available.

questionTitle: Which of the following is useful for legal compliance or to provide a long-term historical record?
questionExplanation: Data archives are often confused with backups.

questionTitle:
Which of the following architecture is shown in the following figure?
Service Oriented Modelling practice
Modelling Environments
Modelling Solutions
Best Practices
questionExplanation: A service in SOMF that is granular and very narrow in scope is referred to as an atomic service.

questionTitle: Which of the following standard is used for publishing a Web service that is used in cloud computing?
questionExplanation: WSDL standard contributes to the Service Oriented Architecture (SOA).

questionTitle: Microsoft offers a _______ calculator for the Windows Azure Platform.
questionExplanation: SQL Azure charges are based on two different programs.

questionTitle: Which of the following can be identified as cloud?
questionExplanation: When an intranet becomes large enough that a diagram no longer wishes to differentiate between individual physical systems, the intranet too becomes identified as a cloud.

questionTitle: Which of the following is storage data interchange interface for stored data objects?
questionExplanation: OCCI stands for Open Cloud Computing Interface.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: Microsoft’s approach is to view cloud applications as software plus service
questionOption2: Microsoft calls their cloud operating system the Windows Platform
questionOption3: Azure is a combination of virtualized infrastructure to which the .NET Framework has been added as a set of .NET Services
questionExplanation: In SaaS model, the cloud is another platform and applications can run locally and access cloud services or run entirely in the cloud and be accessed by browsers using standard Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) protocols.

questionTitle: Which of the following system was replaced with Google Translate?
questionExplanation: Translate uses what is referred to as a corpus linguistics approach to translation.

questionTitle: Which of the following is used to evaluate your own cloud application’s network performance?
questionExplanation: It can also create a scorecard of a cloud network.

questionTitle: Which of the following figure is associated with Description Module in SOA stack?
questionExplanation: WSDL is a language for describing web services and how to access them.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: For a cloud-based virtual computer, the network interface may be a highly variable resource
questionOption2: Increasing the variability between servers makes it easier to troubleshoot problems and simpler to deploy and configure new systems
questionOption3: A server with the different set of software, system configuration, and hardware should perform similarly if given the same role in an infrastructure
questionExplanation: Cloud vendor moves virtual systems around on physical systems or reconfigure its network pathways on the fly to accommodate demand.
